https://tmrev.io/movie/660328-Brigitte Bardot Forever 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2NK27uIkxBZn38I0K77Jdw5KXdh.jpg Inspired by the tale of Telemachus in Homer’s Odyssey, young Adam’s mother is persecuted by the state police because his father fought in WWII as a pilot before disappearing. Adam fantasizes about his father and one day, while watching Godard’s Contempt in the cinema, finds himself transported into the dressing room of Brigitte Bardot and into a world where he meets a coterie of her contemporary celebrities. Brigitte Bardot Forever
